directions: Soften the butter with an electric mixer or leave it out and mash it with a fork.
Bake for 5 mins, then press on the gently with a fork. Bake for another 18 minutes. Let them cool for 5 mins, then put it in your mouth.
I don't like them that sweet so I didn't add that much Splenda. It makes about 8 cookies. 2.7 grams of carbs per cookie.
ingredients: 1/4 cup of granulated Splenda (you can add more)
title: Low-Carb Simple Almond Cookies
